name: httx_
description: An extremely limited and straightforward File System Routing setup for Express, inspired to work with HTMX <3

scripts.demo: npx httx --routes demo/routes --output demo/main.ts --public demo/public --port 9000 && tsc -p demo.tsconfig.json && node build/demo/main.js
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Matthew Parry-Wilkes
